Title: Lateef Adedimeji honours tradition as Ojude Oba 2025 kicks off in style
Summary: Nollywood star, Lateef Adedimeji, was one of the star attractions in this year's Ojude-Oba Festival . The 2025 edition of the iconic festival kicks off in style .

Title: UniPort mourns student killed in off-campus shooting
Summary: The University of Port Harcourt (UniPort) has expressed deep sorrow over the death of a 300-level Computer Science student, Mr. Godwin Francis . UniPort mourns student killed in off-campus shooting .

Title: Eid-el-Kabir: Army chief celebrates frontline troops in Jos
Summary: The Chief of Army Staff celebrated frontline troops of the Nigerian Army’s 3 Division and Operation SAFE HAVEN with a special Eid-el-Kabir luncheon in Jos, Plateau State . The event was held at the Headquarters of the Army's 3 Division .

Title: Zamfara: Matawalle woos Lawal to APC
Summary: Dr Bello Matawalle has formally invited Gov. Dauda Lawal to join the All Progressives Congress (APC) This is contained in a statement issued in Gusau on Sunday .

Title: I pointed no firearm at anybody- Pastor Adefarasin
Summary: Pastor Paul Adefarasin of House on the Rock Church has debunked claims that he pointed a firearm at an aggressive content creator . Pastor Adfarasin said he pointed no firearm at anybody .

Title: Ogoni group faults FG over commissioning of incomplete Eleme section of East-West road
Summary: The apex socio-cultural organization of the Ogoni people, KAGOTE, has criticized the Federal Government for commissioning what it described as an uncompleted section of the East-West Road in Eleme, Rivers State .

Title: Ooni lauds Tinubu’s Forest Guard initiative
Summary: Oba Adeyeye Ogunwusi commended President Bola Tinubu’s newly proposed forest guard security structure . The Ooni of Ife has commended the initiative .

Title: UNIPORT demands probe into killing of 300-level student by security personnel
Summary: UNIPORT demands probe into killing of 300-level Computer Science student by security operatives . Management of the University of Port Harcourt (UNIPORT) has called for a thorough and discreet investigation .

Title: MINILS DG, Aremu, expresses confidence in sustainable renewed hope reform agenda
Summary: Director General of the Michael Imoudu National Institute for Labour Studies, MINILS, Ilorin, Kwara State, expressed total confidence in the sustainable Renewed Hope agenda of President Bola Tinubu .

Title: Don’t conceal truth about Aburi accord, civil war, Igbo women group tells Gowon
Summary: Pan Igbo women group, Igbo Women Assembly, urges Gowon to open up on 'Aburi Accord' which he signed with late Biafran war lord, Dim Chukwuemeka Odumegwu Ojukwu, before the Nigeria civil war broke out . Don't conceal truth about Aburi accord,

Title: PICTORIAL: Sanwo-Olu unveils three new trains, doubles capacity
Summary: Lagos State Governor, Babajide Sanwo-Olu, on Sunday commissioned three new train sets for the Lagos Rail Mass Transit Blue Line . The governor made the announcement via his official social media handles, stating that each newly unveiled train set comprises four cars . The addition of these trains will double the current passenger capacity on the

Title: Nations League: France beat Germany 2-0 for bronze, Mbappe scores 50th goal
Summary: Kylian Mbappe bagged a goal and an assist as France beat Germany 2-0 in the Nations League bronze-medal match in Stuttgart on Sunday . Germany dominated the opening half but France struck just before half-time . The Real Madrid man collected a pass which floated over the 1.77-metre tall

Title: Firm completes first crude export from Otakikpo onshore terminal
Summary: The export was completed at about 2pm on Sunday, June 8, when an off-taker vessel chartered by Shell lifted the maiden crude cargo from the terminal, located in the Otakikpo marginal field, Rivers State . The terminal is Nigeria’s first privately built and operated onshore crude export facility in over five decades

Title: June 12: Power belongs to the people -C'River gov
Summary: Governor Bassey Otu of Cross River has reiterated his administration’s focus on developmental projects, stressing that power belongs to the people and they must enjoy democratic dividends . He said his mission includes directly impacting lives, providing roads, agriculture, electricity, and healthcare as means of unlocking economic potential and improving the well-being of citizens .

Title: Fintiri unveils c'ttee to tackle drug abuse in Adamawa
Summary: Adamawa State Governor Ahmadu Fintiri has approved the creation of a state-level committee to combat drug abuse in the state . The committee aims to bolster the efforts of the National Drug Law Enforcement Agency, will be chaired by the state’s Deputy Governor .
